structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section: The air pollution control board of an air pollution control district may make and enforce all needful orders, rules, and regulations necessary or proper to accomplish the purposes of this chapter for the administration of such district, and may perform all other acts necessary or proper to accomplish the purposes of this chapter.

Nothing in KRS 77.150 to 77.175 limits in any way the power of the air pollution control board to make needful orders, rules, and regulations pursuant to KRS 77.180 to 77.240. Nothing in KRS 77.150 to 77.175 permits any action contrary to any such order, rule, or regulation.

law.history: Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 53, secs. 41 and 44, effective March 14, 1952.
